title: Calvin Glenn
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184357/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184357/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers): Calvin Glenn**

Founder of [NIMX](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184357/http:/typophile.com/wiki/NIMX) and designer of several typefaces including the popular [Jacoby](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184357/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Jacoby) family. Jacoby had the distinction of being one of the earliest (if not very first) commercial third-party [Multiple Master](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012184357/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Multiple%20Master) typefaces. Calvin is currently Marketing Manager at Oracle.
author: Grant Hutchinson
